scripts.build:docker: docker buildx build -f ./apps/api-gateway/Dockerfile -t mark-api-gateway --no-cache --platform linux/amd64 . &> build-gateway.log && docker buildx build -f ./apps/web/Dockerfile -t mark-web --no-cache --platform linux/amd64 . &> build-web.log && docker buildx build -f ./apps/api/Dockerfile -t mark-api --no-cache --platform linux/amd64 . &> build-api.log
scripts.db: source dev.env && docker run --name mark-postgres -e POSTGRES_PASSWORD=$POSTGRES_PASSWORD -e POSTGRES_USER=$POSTGRES_USER -e POSTGRES_DB=$POSTGRES_DB -p 6001:5432 -d postgres
scripts.seed: source dev.env && docker cp seed.sql mark-postgres:/tmp/seed.sql && docker exec -i mark-postgres pg_restore --username=$POSTGRES_USER --dbname=$POSTGRES_DB --no-owner --no-acl --clean --if-exists --no-password /tmp/seed.sql
scripts.predb: docker ps -aq -f name=^mark-postgres$ | xargs -r docker rm -f
scripts.setup: [ -d "$(git rev-parse --show-toplevel)/apps/api" ] && cd "$(git rev-parse --show-toplevel)/apps/api" && op run --env-file=./dev.env -- npx prisma migrate dev && npx prisma generate; cd $(git rev-parse --show-toplevel)
scripts.setup:no-git: cd "./apps/api" && op run --env-file=./dev.env -- npx prisma migrate dev && npx prisma generate; cd ../../
scripts.start: set -e && yarn db && yarn seed && yarn setup && yarn dev
